alert.note: Alert for Clay; Wilkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:29AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Clay and northeastern Wilkin Counties through 500 AM CDT... At 429 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Baker, or 18 miles southeast of Fargo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Baker around 435 AM CDT. Downer around 440 AM CDT. Barnesville around 445 AM CDT. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 13 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
